input_text:
Job Title: Laser Operator - 3rd Shift (11pm - 7am)

Location: Wooster, OH

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Why Join Stahl?*

At Stahl, we boast a rich heritage spanning back to 1946, driven by a relentless pursuit of innovation and excellence in delivering top-tier products to our esteemed clientele. By becoming a part of our team, you're not just securing a job; you're investing in your future. Backed by your skills, experience, and a commitment to reliability, Stahl offers a nurturing environment primed for career development through personalized mentoring, comprehensive job training, and abundant avenues for long-term growth.

*Perks and Benefits*

 *$1000 Sign-On Bonus*: Earned after six months of dedicated service. *Paid Breaks and Lunch*: Your time is valued, and we ensure you have the opportunity to recharge. *Competitive Wages and Career Advancement Opportunities*: Recognizing and rewarding talent and dedication. *Comprehensive Benefits Package*: Including medical, dental, and vision insurance, alongside voluntary coverage for Life, Critical Illness, and Accident insurance. Enjoy company-paid life and AD&D insurance, along with Short-Term Disability coverage. *Pension/401(k)*: Invest in your future with our retirement savings plan. *Vacation and Holiday Allowance*: Ensuring work-life balance is prioritized. *Referral Bonuses*: Rewarding you for bringing talented individuals into our team. *Safety Gear Reimbursement*: Including support for safety shoes and prescription safety eyewear.

*Job Summary*

As a valued member of our team, you will be responsible for operating our laser machines to consistently deliver high-quality products.

*Key Responsibilities*

 *Material Selection and Program Operation*: Ensure the correct materials and programs are utilized for efficient machine operation. *Quality Assurance*: Conduct thorough checks to maintain the integrity of our products. *Operational Support*: Utilize equipment such as cranes and tow motors as required. *Safety and Housekeeping*: Uphold stringent safety standards and maintain a clean work environment. *Flexibility*: Be open to performing other duties as directed by your Supervisor.

*Minimum Requirements*

 *Education*: High School diploma or equivalent preferred. *Experience*: While manufacturing experience is preferred, it's not mandatory. We welcome dedicated individuals willing to learn and grow.

*Physical Demands*

 Regularly required to stand, bend, reach, and move around the facility. Ability to lift up to 50 pounds.

*Personal Protective Equipment (PPE)*

 Required usage of safety glasses, hearing protection, and safety-toed shoes.

*Work Environment*

 Plant environment with typical elements such as noise, dust, odors, and fumes. Conditions are manageable, with no extreme discomfort. Be prepared for moderate heat during the summertime.

Join us at Stahl, where your dedication and ambition meet a supportive environment committed to your professional development and well-being.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: From $21.73 per hour

Expected hours: No less than 40 per week

Benefits

 401(k) Dental insurance Employee assistance program Flexible spending account Health insurance Health savings account Life insurance Paid time off Referral program Retirement plan Vision insurance

Schedule

 8 hour shift

Application Question(s)

 What is your hourly pay preference? Part of the Pre-Employment Screening will be a background check and a drug screen, will this be a problem?

Experience

 Manufacturing: 1 year (Preferred) CNC laser cutting: 2 years (Preferred)

Work Location: In person

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
